variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.service
| expand tags
| filter in(tags, $tags) or in($tags, "All")
| dedup id
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.service
 | fields tags
| expand tags
| | filter tag == "{{ .name }}" 
 | dedup tags
| sort tags

fetch dt.entity.host
| expand tags
| filter in(tags, $tags) or in($tags, "All")
| dedup id
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| expand tags
| filter in(tags, $tags) or in($tags, "All")
| dedup id
| fields id

1.title: Service Health
1.query:
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter in(id, $Services)
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
  | fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 5, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2)))))
  | sort severity, display_id
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id, event.category, severity}
| fieldsAdd timestamp=$dt_timeframe_to, severity=coalesce(severity, 10), status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", event.category, else: "OK")
| sort severity asc, entity.name

10.title: 🚩 Failure Rate
10.query:
timeseries {failures=sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, default:0), requests=sum(dt.service.request.count, default:1)}, by: { dt.entity.service },
filter: in(dt.entity.service, $Services)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service),failureRate = failures[]/requests[]*100
| fieldsRemove failures, requests
| sort arrayLast(failureRate) desc
| limit 20

11.title: 📈 Throughput
11.query:
timeseries requests=sum(dt.service.request.count, default:0), by: { dt.entity.service }, 
filter:{in(dt.entity.service, $Services) and isNotNull(dt.entity.process_group)} //remove DB services
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| sort arrayAvg(requests) desc
| limit 20

12.title: ⏱️ Response Time
12.query:
timeseries requests=avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by: { dt.entity.service },
filter: in(dt.entity.service, $Services)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| sort arrayAvg(requests) desc
| limit 20

13.title: 📔 Log Patterns
13.query:
fetch logs, samplingRatio:10
| filter in(status, $LogStatus)
| filter dt.entity.process_group in [
 fetch dt.entity.service
 | filter in(id, $Services)
 | fields runs_on[dt.entity.process_group]
]
| parse content, "DATA* JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd pattern=coalesce(message,msg,json[message],json[msg],json[rest],rest,content)
| fieldsAdd pattern=replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(pattern, "UUIDSTRING", "UUID"), "(ISO8601|HTTPDATE|JSONTIMESTAMP|TIMESTAMP|TIME)", "TIME"),"IPADDR", "IP"), "'-' ALNUM{10} '-' ALNUM{5}", "-PODID"), "XDIGIT{5,}", "*"), "DIGIT", "*"), "' /' NSPACE*", " /URLPATH"), "'://' [^/ ] '/'? NSPACE*", "://URL"), "'[!dt' LD ']'", ""), "' '*", " ")
//specific for airlines
| fieldsAdd pattern=replacePattern(pattern, "'airport=<'WORD{3}'>'", "airport=<*>")
| maketimeseries {count=count(default:0)}, by: {status,pattern, dt.entity.process_group, dt.entity.cloud_application}
| fieldsAdd severity = if(status=="ERROR", 0, else: if(status=="WARN", 1, else:if(status=="NONE", 2, else: 3))), Overall=arraySum(count)*10
| sort severity, Overall desc
//| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.process_group)
| fieldsRename Pattern=pattern, Count=count, Status=status

14.title: 🖹 Logs
14.query:
fetch logs
| filter in(status, $LogStatus)
| filter dt.entity.process_group in [
 fetch dt.entity.service
 | filter in(id, $Services)
 | fields runs_on[dt.entity.process_group]
]
| parse content, "DATA* JSON:json"
| parse content, "DATA* '\"rest\":' DQS:rest"
| fieldsAdd Status=status, Timestamp=timestamp, Message=coalesce(message,msg,json[message],json[msg],json[rest],rest,content)
| fieldsKeep Status, Timestamp, Message, "dt.entity.*", timestamp, trace_id, span_id
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 100

17.title: Process Health
17.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| filter in(id, $ProcessGroupInstance)
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
  | fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 5, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2)))))
  | sort severity, display_id
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id, event.category, severity}
| fieldsAdd timestamp=$dt_timeframe_to, severity=coalesce(severity, 10), status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", event.category, else: "OK")
| sort severity asc, entity.name

25.title: 🔥 CPU Usage
25.query:
timeseries cpu=avg(dt.process.cpu.usage, rate:1m), 
filter: dt.entity.process_group in [
 fetch dt.entity.service
 | filter in(id, $Services)
 | fields runs_on[dt.entity.process_group]
], by:{dt.entity.host, dt.entity.process_group_instance, host.name}
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance)
| sort arrayMax(cpu) desc
| limit 10

26.title: 📃 Memory Usage
26.query:
timeseries memory=avg(dt.process.memory.working_set_size, rate:1m), 
filter: dt.entity.process_group in [
 fetch dt.entity.service
 | filter in(id, $Services)
 | fields runs_on[dt.entity.process_group]
], by:{dt.entity.host, dt.entity.process_group_instance, host.name}
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance)
| sort arrayMax(memory) desc
| limit 10

dt.statistics.ui.ForecastAnalyzer.query:
timeseries memory=avg(dt.process.memory.working_set_size, rate:1m), 
filter: dt.entity.process_group in [
 fetch dt.entity.service
 | filter in(id,  | fields runs_on[dt.entity.process_group]
], by:{dt.entity.host, dt.entity.process_group_instance, host.name}
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance)
| sort arrayMax(memory) desc
| limit 10

32.title: 🛑 Problems
32.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| fieldsAdd entityIds=arrayConcat(root_cause_entity_id,affected_entity_ids)[]
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.application = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "APPLICATION-"), entityIds[]),dt.entity.cloud_application = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "CLOUD_APPLICATION-"), entityIds[]), dt.entity.cloud_application_instance = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-"), entityIds[]), dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "KUBERNETES_CLUSTER-"), entityIds[]),dt.entity.kubernetes_node = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "KUBERNETES_NODE-"), entityIds[]),dt.entity.service = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "SERVICE-"), entityIds[]),dt.entity.process_group = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "PROCESS_GROUP-"), entityIds[]),dt.entity.process_group_instance = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "PROCESS_GROUP_INSTANCE-"), entityIds[]),dt.entity.host = if(startsWith(entityIds[], "HOST-"), entityIds[])
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.application = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.application), dt.entity.cloud_application = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.cloud_application), dt.entity.cloud_application_instance = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.cloud_application_instance), dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster),dt.entity.kubernetes_node = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.kubernetes_node),dt.entity.service = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.service), dt.entity.process_group = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.process_group), dt.entity.process_group_instance = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.process_group_instance),dt.entity.host = arrayRemoveNulls(dt.entity.host)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.application = dt.entity.application[0], dt.entity.cloud_application = dt.entity.cloud_application[0], dt.entity.cloud_application_instance = dt.entity.cloud_application_instance[0], dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster=dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster[0], dt.entity.kubernetes_node=dt.entity.kubernetes_node[0],dt.entity.service=dt.entity.service[0],dt.entity.process_group=dt.entity.process_group[0],dt.entity.process_group_instance=dt.entity.process_group_instance[0],dt.entity.host=dt.entity.host[0]
| fieldsAdd `Affected`=concat(coalesce(entityName(dt.entity.application), entityName(dt.entity.service), entityName(dt.entity.process_group), entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance), entityName(dt.entity.host), entityName(dt.entity.cloud_application), entityName(dt.entity.cloud_application_instance), entityName(dt.entity.kubernetes_node), entityName(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster), dt.entity.process_group_instance), if(arraySize(affected_entity_ids) > 1, concat(" + ", arraySize(affected_entity_ids) - 1), else: ""))
| fieldsAdd `Affected Count`=arraySize(affected_entity_ids)
| fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 2, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2))))),
  Duration=coalesce(event.end-event.start, now()-event.start),
  `Affected Users`=coalesce(dt.davis.affected_users_count, "-")
| sort severity, display_id
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter in(affected_entity_ids, $Services)
| dedup display_id
| fieldsAdd display_id = concat("[", display_id, "](", $tenant, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.problems/#problems/problemdetails;pid=", event.id, ")")
| fields Start=event.start, Duration, Status=event.status, ID=display_id, Severity=event.category, Name = event.name, Affected, `Affected Count`, `Affected Users`,`Root Cause`=root_cause_entity_name, Description=event.description, event.id, dt.entity.application, dt.entity.cloud_application, dt.entity.cloud_application_instance, dt.entity.host, dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, dt.entity.kubernetes_node, dt.entity.host_group, dt.entity.process_group, dt.entity.process_group_instance, event.start, event.end
| sort Status, Severity, Start

33.title: ♻️ Garbage Collection
33.query:
timeseries `Garbage Collection Time`=max(dt.runtime.jvm.gc.collection_time, default:0, rate:1m), by: { dt.entity.process_group_instance }, bins:20, filter: dt.entity.process_group in [
 fetch dt.entity.service
 | filter in(id, $Services)
 | fields runs_on[dt.entity.process_group]
]
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.process_group_instance.name = entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance)
| sort arrayAvg(`Garbage Collection Time`) desc
| limit 20

vader-profiling","yoda-project-dynamic-discovery-radius-heuristics-data","yoda-project-e2e-project-1711483317260","yoda-project-e2e-project-1712231695483","yoda-project-e2e-project-1712232640266","yoda-project-e2e-test-project-1712233740956","yoda-project-e2e-test-project-1712233862007","yoda-project-e2e-test-project-1712234245299","yoda-project-e2e-test-project-1712234968958","yoda-project-e2e-test-project-1712318385071","yoda-project-e2e-tests","yoda-project-e360","yoda-project-event-analytics","yoda-project-farasha-food-accelerant","yoda-project-farasha-poc","yoda-project-food-contextulized-tiles","yoda-project-galileo","yoda-project-hypergate","yoda-project-hyperstore","yoda-project-hyperstore-demo","yoda-project-jabba","yoda-project-legacy-search-service","yoda-project-osiris-bot","yoda-project-pre-auth-v4","yoda-project-quik-embeddings","yoda-project-quik-recipe-search","yoda-project-rh-customer-cancellation","yoda-project-routing","yoda-project-skywalker","yoda-project-test-new-controller","yoda-project-test-new-k8s","yoda-project-try-fixed-annotations","yoda-project-vector-benchmark","yoda-project-workbook-test","yoda-servo","yoda-system","yoda-taxonomy-inference-svc","yoda-tensorboards","yoda-tidb","yoda-ui","yoda-workflows","yoda-workspaces") ], sourceField:k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name, lookupField:k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name, fields:{capacity}
| fieldsAdd result = (pvc_used[] / capacity[]) * 100
| fieldsRemove pvc_used, capacity 
| sort result desc 
| limit 10

36.query:
timeseries {failures=sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, default:0), requests=sum(dt.service.request.count, default:1)},
filter: in(dt.entity.service, $Services)
| fieldsAdd failureRate = failures[]/requests[]*100
| fieldsAdd `Failures`=arrayAvg(failureRate)

leftYAxisSettings.label: Service failure count • Service request count

37.title: Frontend Health
37.query:
fetch dt.entity.application
| expand service=calls[dt.entity.service]
| filter in(service, $Services)  
| dedup id
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
  | fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 5, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2)))))
  | sort severity, display_id
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id, event.category, severity}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", event.category, else: "OK"), timestamp=$dt_timeframe_to, severity=coalesce(severity, 10)
| sort severity asc, entity.name

43.query:
timeseries {
  responseTime_p50 = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 50, rate:1m), 
  responseTime_p90 = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 90, rate:1m), 
  request_count = sum(dt.service.request.count, rate:1m, default:0),
  failure_count = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, rate:1m, default:0)
  }, 
  by:{dt.entity.process_group, dt.entity.service, endpoint.name},
  filter:isNotNull(dt.entity.process_group) and isNotNull(dt.entity.service) and in(dt.entity.service, $Services), //remove database services and external services
  nonempty:false, union:false
| fieldsAdd failureRate_timeseries = failure_count[] / request_count[]  * 100,
    entityName(dt.entity.process_group), entityName(dt.entity.service),
    endpoint.name=if(endpoint.name=="NON_KEY_REQUESTS", "<others>", else: endpoint.name),
    joinkey = concat(dt.entity.service, endpoint.name)
| join [
  fetch dt.entity.service_method
  | fields dt.entity.service_method=id, joinkey=concat(belongs_to[dt.entity.service],entity.name)
], on:{left[joinkey]==right[joinkey]}, fields:{dt.entity.service_method}, kind:leftOuter
| fields  `Failure Rate`=arrayAvg(failureRate_timeseries), P50=arrayAvg(responseTime_p50), P90=arrayAvg(responseTime_p90), `Requests`=arraySum(request_count), 
`Process Group`=concat("[",replaceString(replaceString(replaceString(replaceString(dt.entity.process_group.name, "[", "\\["), "]", "\\]"), "(", "\\("), ")", "\\)"), "](",  $tenant, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.technologies/#processgroupdetails;gtf=-2h;gf=all;id=", dt.entity.process_group, ";appswitched=true)"), 
`Service`=concat("[",replaceString(replaceString(replaceString(replaceString(dt.entity.service.name, "[", "\\["), "]", "\\]"), "(", "\\("), ")", "\\)"), "](",  $tenant, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.services/explorer?perspective=performance&detailsId=", dt.entity.service, "&detailsTab=Overview)"),
`Endpoint`=endpoint.name,
Analyze=concat(
"[Traces](",  $tenant, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Ctrue&sidebar=u%2Cfalse&tf=", encodeUrl(formatTimestamp(timeframe[start], timezone: "UTC", format:"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'")), "%3B", encodeUrl(formatTimestamp(arrayMin(array(timeframe[end], now())), timezone: "UTC", format:"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'")),  "&filter=dt.entity.service+%3D+", dt.entity.service, if(endpoint.name != "<others>", concat("+AND+endpoint.name+%3D+", endpoint.name), else: ""), ")",
"[Failures](",  $tenant, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.services/#failureanalysis;sci=", dt.entity.service, if(endpoint.name != "<others>", concat(";servicefilter=0%1E9%11", dt.entity.service_method), else:""), ";timeframe=custom", unixMillisFromTimestamp(timeframe[start]), "to", unixMillisFromTimestamp(arrayMin(array(timeframe[end], now()))), ")",
"[Hotspots](",  $tenant, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.services/#responsetimeanalysis;sci=", dt.entity.service, if(endpoint.name != "<others>", concat(";servicefilter=0%1E9%11", dt.entity.service_method), else:""), ";timeframe=custom", unixMillisFromTimestamp(timeframe[start]), "to", unixMillisFromTimestamp(arrayMin(array(timeframe[end], now()))), ")",
"[Flow](",  $tenant, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.services/#serviceflow;sci=", dt.entity.service, if(endpoint.name != "<others>", concat(";servicefilter=0%1E9%11", dt.entity.service_method), else:""), ";timeframe=custom", unixMillisFromTimestamp(timeframe[start]), "to", unixMillisFromTimestamp(arrayMin(array(timeframe[end], now()))), ")"
),
dt.entity.process_group, dt.entity.service, dt.entity.service_method, timeframe, interval

leftYAxisSettings.label: Service request response time • Service request count

44.title: Host Health
44.query:
fetch dt.entity.host
| filter in(id, $Hosts)
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
  | fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 5, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2)))))
  | sort severity, display_id
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id, event.category, severity}
| fieldsAdd timestamp=$dt_timeframe_to, severity=coalesce(severity, 10), status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", event.category, else: "OK")
| sort severity asc, entity.name

46.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter in(affected_entity_ids, $Services)
| filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 2, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2)))))
| sort severity, display_id
| expand affected_entity_ids
| dedup display_id
| fieldsRename Start=event.start, ID=display_id, Severity=event.category, Name = event.name, Cluster=k8s.cluster.name, Namespace=k8s.namespace.name, Workload=k8s.workload.name
| summarize count(), min(severity)

leftYAxisSettings.label: Service failure count • Service request count

48.title: 💾 Disk Used %
48.query:
timeseries { avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent), value.A = avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent, scalar: true) }, by: { host.name, dt.entity.host, dt.entity.gcp_zone, dt.entity.ec2_instance, dt.entity.disk, dt.entity.azure_vm, dt.entity.azure_region, dt.entity.aws_availability_zone }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.host.name = entityName(dt.entity.host)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.gcp_zone.name = entityName(dt.entity.gcp_zone)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.ec2_instance.name = entityName(dt.entity.ec2_instance)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.disk.name = entityName(dt.entity.disk)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.azure_vm.name = entityName(dt.entity.azure_vm)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.azure_region.name = entityName(dt.entity.azure_region)
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.aws_availability_zone.name = entityName(dt.entity.aws_availability_zone)
| sort `avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent)` desc
| limit 20
